resources.string: The android application “IDEAMAXIMA” is for IT Company.
This application works for employee, manager and owner.
This application is basically used to share the idea of employee and manager.

If any employee of the company want to share any idea for growth of the company he can post his idea in this application and its approved by manager and same as if manager want to share any idea for growth of the company then he can post his idea in this application.
If that idea already available then it is rejected. After acceptance of the idea employee works on that particular idea.
